body_html:
I find that this is because of OOM, I fix this by qunluo@a00b77b.
Maybe there are some errors in cudnnGetConvolutionForwardWorkspaceSize, but I didn't have the source code for debugging(Nvidia didn't open source).
I also recommend changing the cuda error to qunluo@44b79f7.

I find that this is because of OOM, I fix this by qunluo@a00b77b.

body:
I find that this is because of OOM, I fix this by https://github.com/qunluo/pytorch/commit/a00b77bb69904b864da39cab0bdf39bb0ebba6f6.
Maybe there are some errors in cudnnGetConvolutionForwardWorkspaceSize, but I didn't have the source code for debugging(Nvidia didn't open source).
I also recommend changing the cuda error to https://github.com/qunluo/pytorch/commit/44b79f70c337ea53a928bb79988b02b237f05b15.
